definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to grasp firmly/to pay special attention to/to rush in/to make the most of
to intensify/to speed up/to step up
(economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
to stick close to/to press up against

sentences.english: The cap passes close word, can accelerate the rate of trichomadesis.
sentences.chinese: 帽子過緊的話，會加快脫髮的速度。

sentences.english: I think we'll just make it if we hurry up!
sentences.chinese: 如果抓點緊，我想我們能及時到達。

sentences.english: Now fortunately this time, it's not speaking role.
sentences.chinese: 時間比較緊，我就不說規則了。

sentences.english: She stood close against the door.
In order to make strong shot, a player must be able to hold racket very hard.
sentences.chinese: 爲了擊球有力，選手必須將拍子抓得非常緊。

sentences.english: Winter cold wind, moon Leng Xing rare.
In constructing certain project, the time limit was short, so that the slip form techniques were adopted.
sentences.chinese: 在工期要求非常緊的情況下，該工程採用了滑模施工。

sentences.english: You went into far Ku-to-yen, by the river of swirling eddies.
sentences.chinese: 你去了瞿塘灩澦堆，緊挨着那條河，密密麻麻的漩渦。

sentences.english: The war showed that Russia and the West are now cemented together, he argues.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲這場戰爭表明俄羅斯和西方現在粘得更緊了。

sentences.english: Install the shades as close to the glass as possible.
sentences.chinese: 安裝的時候，儘量把這種遮光窗戶和玻璃安的緊一點。

sentences.english: She clasped her sister's waist, and together they descended the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 她緊摟着姐姐的腰，一起走下樓去。

sentences.english: The jars should not be packed so tightly that any single leaf could not be easily pulled out by its stem.
sentences.chinese: 的罐子，不應該裝得那麼緊，不容易被拉任何單葉莖。

sentences.english: Let M be a connected and compact homogeneous space.
sentences.chinese: 設M爲一連通的緊緻齊性空間。

sentences.english: This was closely followed by activities of interest and the weather.
sentences.chinese: 緊接下來的是感興趣的活動以及天氣。

sentences.english: She not only can be embosomed but also can be kissed seethingly as much as you like.
sentences.chinese: 不但可以緊擁入懷，還可以盡情親吻。

definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
